text: Paget's disease is the name for different diseases, which where first described by Sir James Paget. * Paget's disease of the bone, in which bones of the skeleton change, thicken and grow uncontrollably. * Paget's disease of the breast, a rare form of breast cancer * Paget-von-Schroetter syndrome,a form of thrombosis * Extramammary Paget's disease
title: Paget's disease
